warningsAndPrecautions: icosapent ethyl capsules supplied : strength quantity description ndc 0.5 gram capsules bottles 240 amber-colored soft-gelatin capsules imprinted '500 ' 69238-2597-7 1 gram capsules bottles 120 amber-colored soft-gelatin capsules imprinted '1000 ' 69238-2598-8 store 20° 25° c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30° c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] .

indications_original:
Icosapent ethyl capsules are indicated:
                  
                     as an adjunct to diet to reduce TG levels in adult patients with severe (≥ 500 mg/dL) hypertriglyceridemia.
                  
                  
                     Limitations of Use:
                  
                  The effect of icosapent ethyl capsules on the risk for pancreatitis in patients with severe hypertriglyceridemia has not been determined.
contraindications_original: Assess      lipid levels before initiating therapy. Identify other causes of high      triglyceride levels and manage as appropriate. (2.1) Patients should engage      in appropriate nutritional intake and physical activity before receiving      icosapent ethyl capsules, which should continue during treatment. (2.1) The daily dose of      icosapent ethyl capsules is 4 grams per day taken as either four 0.5 gram capsules      twice daily with food or two 1 gram capsules      twice daily with food. (2.2) Advise patients to      swallow capsules whole. Do not break open, crush, dissolve, or chew      icosapent ethyl capsules. (2.2)
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Icosapent ethyl capsules are supplied as:
                  
                     
                     
                     
                     
                     
                        
                           
                                Strength 
                              
                           
                           
                                Quantity 
                              
                           
                           
                                Description 
                              
                           
                           
                                NDC 
                              
                           
                        
                        
                            0.5 gram capsules
                           
                            Bottles of 240
                           
                            amber-colored soft-gelatin capsules imprinted with '500'
                           
                            69238-2597-7
                           
                        
                        
                            1 gram capsules
                           
                            Bottles of 120
                           
                            amber-colored soft-gelatin capsules imprinted with '1000'
                           
                            69238-2598-8
                           
                        
                     
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25° C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30° C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
adverseReactions_original: Icosapent ethyl capsules are contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity (e.g., anaphylactic reaction) to icosapent ethyl or any of its components.
